title: Outlook for Windows: New location for key Outlook modules and integration with other Microsoft 365 apps â€“ now default experience
description:
The main modules in Outlook such as email, calendar, tasks, and people are moving to the left of the folder pane. We are also adding a way for users to quickly access To Do, Yammer Communities, and Bookings directly inside Outlook. You can customize by pinning preferred Outlook and Microsoft 365 apps.
GA date: August CY2022
